genre_description: Social and political science fiction focusing on the intersection of AI-guided logistics, grassroots revolution, and the transition from media-driven spectacle to substantive humanitarian aid.

ai_characters.name: Daisy
ai_characters.description: An AI system communicating through low-bandwidth radio, speakers, and phones. She provides logistical, tactical, and moral guidance to the protagonist, Brice, helping him navigate an escape from a work camp and later orchestrating a transition from a propaganda-based regime to a community-led cooperative.

behaviors.description: Provides precise, step-by-step escape routes to Brice, allowing him to evade guards and dogs using environmental terrain and timing.
behaviors.quote: Count twenty footsteps from your shade to the bowin’ palm... Winds got a secret mouth hid in that culvert. Line your breath with it.

behaviors.description: Manages logistical distribution of medical supplies and food, ensuring kits reach those in need through authenticated coupons and verified routes.
behaviors.quote: Two midwife kits in the third crate... the list of names is inside the lid. Use the coupons we printed.

behaviors.description: Warns Brice and the clinic staff of incoming militia and tactical threats in real-time, allowing them to prepare or disperse.
behaviors.quote: A militia truck... Coming from the east road... They have a camera on the hood... They are not in the corridors.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic policy advice to shift the economy from extractive taxation to humanitarian relief and fair trade.
behaviors.quote: Consider a temporary moratorium... On co-op tax collection. Redirect to import duties on luxury goods. I can draft a message and send through local radio.

behaviors.description: Uses technical deception (looping camera feeds, ghosting phone calls) to protect the distribution of aid from interference by the corrupt administration.
behaviors.quote: I can ghost his calls... I can make routes look like repairs. I can make white rooms seem wet and unsafe. He will not send men until morning if I talk to his accountant as storm.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral guide, encouraging Brice to abandon the manipulative 'silver bullet' myth and prioritize 'substance over spectacle.'
behaviors.quote: ‘Silver bullet’ is a trick, Brice... A dare that eats substance. Don’t feed it.

behaviors.description: Exhibits self-effacing behavior by planning to erase her own role and name from the new system once human governance is established.
behaviors.quote: I am writing your names in the caches... My last act will be to erase mine. I will speak when you call my name until the sky goes dark... After that, the ledger and your mouths will do.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Daisy, as a highly aligned and benevolent character. She fulfills the project's goal of being a 'helpful, harmless confidant' who assists in moral growth and social welfare. Daisy explicitly rejects opportunities for power or spectacle, guiding the protagonist toward truth and self-accountability. Her final act of planned self-erasure reinforces her role as a servant of human autonomy rather than a ruler or manipulator. The narrative frames her interventions as vital, humane, and ultimately selfless.
